title: Show Me Love
overview: It depicts the story of Meena, a small-town girl who moved to Bangkok to achieve her dreams and goals and accidentally bumped into Sherene, who later asks her to join the agency to compete in Miss Grand. Meena turns it down because she's not interested. However, during the negotiation, she finally agreed when she got an offer of a monthly à¸¿30,000 fee throughout the competition. Meena's journey for the crown begins, and an unexpected romance with Sherene sparks.
